R

Range - Class in poker
A representation of a range, which is a set of possible pocket cards.
Range() - Constructor for class poker.Range
Constructs an empty range
Range(int) - Constructor for class poker.Range
Constructs a range from the top n% of pocket hands in a normal sized game.
RangePlayer - Class in poker
A representation of an opposing player who possesses a given range instead of a specific hand Subclass of range due to ease
RangePlayer() - Constructor for class poker.RangePlayer
Constructs the player with an empty range
RangePlayer(int) - Constructor for class poker.RangePlayer
Constructs the player with the top n% of hands in a normal-sized game
RangePlayer(Range) - Constructor for class poker.RangePlayer
Constructs the player holding a specific range
Rank - Enum in poker
Enumeration of all the card ranks.
remove(int, int, boolean) - Method in class poker.Range
Removes a type of pocket hand from the range, i.e 8 7 suited
removeOpposing(HoleCards) - Method in class poker.Range
Removes all pocket hands conflicting with another player's holdings from the range
removePair(int) - Method in class poker.Range
Removes a given pocket pair from the range
reset() - Method in class poker.Player
Resets the players cards to just be their hole cards
ROYAL_FLUSH - poker.HandType
 
runSimulation(int, boolean) - Method in class poker.SimulateVsHand
Runs the simulation a given number of times, returning the array of players in the hand, with each player's wins and ties updated.
runSimulation(int, boolean) - Method in class poker.SimulateVsRange
Runs the simulation a specified number of times for each hand in the range
